abstract: Surfers are pushing for closed section of Rockaway Beach to be opened as designated surfing area, saying popularity of of sport has revitalized neighborhood; many residents want area opened for swimming instead, which they say would better serve growing number of local homeowners; New York City Parks Department says area cannot be opened at all due to boardwalk reconstruction and lack of qualified lifeguards.
lead_paragraph: A campaign for an expanded surfing area has run up against the objections of residents of a new development that occupies that same stretch of beach.

headline.main: In Fight for a Stretch of the Rockaways, Surfers and New Residents Collide
headline.print_headline: As Rockaways Swell, a Struggle: Whose Waves Are These?

snippet: A campaign for an expanded surfing area has run up against the objections of residents of a new development that occupies that same stretch of beach.
